item.title: Ghost of Yotei ‘Journey Through the Edge of Japan’ video
item.content:encoded:
• PS5

10 minutes showcasing the landscapes of Ezo.

Publisher Sony Interactive Entertainment and developer Sucker Punch Productions have released a 10-minute video for Ghost of Yotei dubbed “Journey Through the Edge of Japan,” which showcases the landscapes of Ezo to an extended version of the original track “The North” composed by Toma Otowa.

Ghost of Yotei is due out for PlayStation 5 on October 2.

item.title: Candy Rangers launches October 2
item.content:encoded:
On-rails shooter Candy Rangers will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam on October 2, publisher JanduSoft and developer Mechano announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Race against time in this brand new on-rails shooter where you control four characters at once!

Meet Candy, Mint, Lemon, and Plum, quadruplets that live together and work as rangers to fight creatures that come in to ruin the natural environments of the city.

In this game, enemies will come in waves in different formations and arrangements, luckily for you, each character’s has its own special gun with its own shooting pattern to help you take them out as efficiently as possible!

Characters

  • Candy – Candy can shoot bullets sideways.
  • Mint – Mint can shoot them vertically.
  • Plum – Plum shoots them back and forth.
  • Lemon – Lemon’s bullets can clear diagonal patterns.

Make good use of each one of them to clear levels as efficiently as possible!

Key Features

  • Four playable worlds and two extra.
  • Four playable characters.
  • Over five languages supported.
  • Single-player.
  • Multiple items to collect that will let you unlock new paths.
